commitResults.messageTitle: Chore: update .gitignore, docs, and test script to suit new chatbot name
Level-4, added Todo, Deadline and Event classes
Recreate Level-0 minimal snapshot on master (greet + exit only)
Recreate Level-1 snapshot on master (echo + bye only)
Restore Level-4 snapshot after fixing Level-0/1
Level-5: added exception based error handling, updated text UI test
Level-6: added delete function, updated whitespace handling, changed some arguments names and comments for better understandability of code
A-Enums: added Command enum, updated parsing so its case-insensitive, revised command loop to incorporate enum usage, updated text-ui-test
Add Storage and fix java code style
commitResults.messageBody: Saves data to data/Yin.txt to allow for persisting list of tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: Add date/time parsing and scheduling support
commitResults.messageBody:
Introduce DateTimes utility class for parsing multiple date formats and
add Schedulable interface. Refactored Deadline and Event classes to
support querying tasks by date.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor(UI): extract Ui and route printing/input through it
Refactor (TaskList): wrap task collection in TaskList and also tidy output
Refactor (yin): remove obsolete handlers and helpers after Parser + TaskList move
Refactor: integrate command class, Parser returns Command, Yin executes
Remove unused readCommand() helper in Ui class
Moved all classes into single package yin
Test: add JUnit tests for Task and Parser

commitResults.messageBody:
Add comprehensive JavaDoc to core classes and methods to match SE-EDU
Java comment conventions, and remove stray // comments that duplicate
Javadoc or narrate obvious code. No functional changes.

Touch:
* yin.Yin, Ui, Parser, Storage, TaskList, Command, DateTimes, Task
* AddEventCommand, AddDeadlineCommand, AddTodoCommand, MarkCommand
* Event, Deadline

Why:
* Centralise accurate documentation and improve readability
* Align with project-wide standards for comments and documentation

commitResults.messageTitle: Tweak coding style to meet SE-EDU conventions
commitResults.messageBody:
Make minor adjustments across the codebase to align with SE-EDU
intermediate Java coding standards. These changes are cosmetic only
and do not affect program behavior.

Tweaks:
* Ui.java: removed unused Scanner field and import
* Storage.java: replaced wildcard import with explicit imports
* DeleteCommand.java: fixed spacing before class brace
* UnmarkCommand.java: fixed double space in `extends Command`

commitResults.messageTitle: Add find command to search tasks by keyword
commitResults.messageBody:
Introduce a new `find` command that searches tasks whose descriptions
contain a given keyword (case-insensitive).

Changes:
* New FindCommand class to encapsulate search behavior
* Parser: add case "find" to parse user input into FindCommand
* TaskList: add find() method to filter tasks by description
* Ui: add showMatches() to display matching tasks or "no matches found"

Apply coding style fixes to align with SE-EDU conventions.
* Removed unused Scanner field from Ui
* Replaced wildcard import in Storage with explicit imports
* Fixed spacing in DeleteCommand and UnmarkCommand

Add JavaDoc comments across core classes and commands to align with
SE-EDU Java conventions. Improves readability and maintainability
without changing program behavior.

Implement find feature (Level-9) to search tasks by keyword in their
descriptions. Extends functionality to allow users to quickly locate
relevant tasks.

Changes:
* New FindCommand class to handle keyword search
* Parser: add "find" case to parse input into FindCommand
* TaskList: add find() method to filter tasks by description
* Ui: add showMatches() to display matching results

Updated code to conform with local checkstyle rules. Fixed Javadoc
comments for clarity and consistency, and made minor adjustments to
the code body to satisfy style checks.

Integrate checkstyle improvements into master. This ensures
consistent formatting and Javadoc style across the codebase.
The changes fix spacing, indentation, and Javadoc comments.

Introduce the GUI components for Yin, including MainWindow,
DialogBox, and FxUi. These classes handle user input, display
chat-style dialogs, and connect the backend AppCore to the
JavaFX front-end.

This change improves user experience by replacing the CLI with
a graphical interface, while still reusing the existing backend
logic for task management. The GUI also ensures that exit and
welcome messages are displayed consistently.

This merge adds the GUI integration for Yin, including the
MainWindow, DialogBox, and FxUi classes. The GUI connects the
backend AppCore to a JavaFX front-end, replacing the CLI with
a chat style interface.

Added assertions to key parts of the codebase to ensure important
invariants hold during execution. Assertions check for non-null inputs,
valid task indices, and correct datetime parsing/serialisation. These
assertions are meant to catch developer errors early, while exceptions
still handle user-facing validation.

Apply SLAP where necessary, remove redundant code,
fix minor bugs (e.g., date pattern) and indentations.
No functional changes beyond bugfixes.
Add assertions to core classes to check for programmer error.

Merge master branch into branch-A-CodeQuality to sync branch with
changes in master.
Merge branch-A-CodeQuality to master.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix Checkstyle config to use project relative path
commitResults.messageBody:
Update build.gradle to reference Checkstyle configuration files from
the repository instead of hard coded Windows-only absolute paths.

Add new ArchiveCommand to allow archiving tasks. Users can now run
"archive all" to move all tasks or "archive done" to move only marked
tasks into an Archive.txt file. Archived tasks are removed from the
active list but preserved in the archive for reference.

Bring C-Archive extension into master, add ArchiveCommand to support
archiving tasks into Archive.txt. Support both "archive all"
(all tasks) and "archive done" (only marked tasks). Update Storage and
Ui to handle archive operations. Preserve archived tasks in separate
file for reference.

Add clearer asymmetry between user and Yin dialogs, and introduce dark
theme. Implement error highlighting with dedicated styles and ensure
texts wrap for better readability. Align avatars to bottom of the dialog
boxes, and also change them to rounded rectangles.

Merge GUI enhancement into master, introducing asymmetry dialog box
layout, dark theme, error message styling for better visibility and UX
refinements with AI assistance.

Credited AI assistance within README.md and also inline comments where
AI assistance was used.

Add User Guide to guide users on how to use app, including screenshot of
the GUI. Move AI usage to AI.md and recover previous README in root.
Move AI.md to root and store there for AI usage acknowledgement.
Ensure the jar file works on MacOS.
